name: NgTalks
description: NgTalks is the first conference in Ukraine dedicated to Angular technologies and covering best practices, approaches and the latest community trends.
solutions: We decided to use Webflow as a main development solution. As it was important to launch the marketing strategy as soon as possible, we delivered the application within 3 weeks.
outcome: NgTalks website is specifically designed to be a central hub for everything about the Ukrainian Kharkov-based Angular conference. It is intended to be simple, clean and easy to navigate for both visitors and speakers.
